en: Vessels can call at the Chathams and there are a number of " safe " harbours for shelter if the need arises .
baseline: 船只可以在查塔姆岛上呼叫,如果需要的话,还有一些“ 安全 ” 的避难港。
zh: 船可以到查汉号来,如果需要,就有一些安全的避难港.
船可以到查汉号来,如果需要,就有一些安全的避难港.
船可以到查汉号来,如果需要,就有一些安全的避难港.

en: Remember to notify the local policeman , or Ministry of Fisheries officer if you are entering New Zealand via the Chathams .
baseline: 若要通过查塔姆进入新西兰,请通知当地警察或渔业部官员。

en: There are several businesses on Chatham Island that will rent you a vehicle .
baseline: 查特姆岛有几家公司会租给你一辆汽车。

en: Do not expect the flashest and latest in rental cars though .
baseline: 尽管如此,不要期望在租车方面最闪亮和最新的。

en: The cars " will " be warranted and safe , but they wo n't be exceptionally " flash " .
baseline: 汽车 " 将 " 得到保证和安全, 但它们不会特别 " 闪光 ".

en: Chatham Motors have a range of nice rental vans available as well and they provide pretty good service for both visitors and locals .
baseline: Chatham Motors也提供一系列漂亮的租车,并为游客和当地人提供相当好的服务。

en: Places Rated Almanac ranks the area second in recreational options out of 354 US metro areas .
baseline: 在354个美国地铁区中,Almanac评级该区在休闲选择中排名第二。
zh: 该区在354个美国地铁区中,在休闲选择中排名第二.
该区在354个美国地铁区中,在康乐选择方面排列第二.

en: Like most U.S. cities , Cleveland proper began to lose population to suburban areas in the 1960s and 1970s .
baseline: 与大多数美国城市一样,克利夫兰 proper在1960年代和1970年代开始在郊区失去人口。

en: While Cleveland continues to play a leading role in building the U.S. industrial base , it has also developed economic prowess in the fields of health care , law , finance , insurance , real estate development , and professional services .
baseline: 克利夫兰继续在建设美国工业基地方面发挥主导作用,同时也在医疗、法律、金融、保险、房地产开发和专业服务领域发展了经济实力。

en: Coron is in the province of Palawan , Philippines on Busuanga Island .
baseline: 科隆位于菲律宾巴拉万省布苏安加岛。
